H0.text: who invented the first computer game in 1962 and what was the name of the game. Tennis for Two

H1.text: who invented the first computer game in 1962 and what was the name of the game. Computer Chess

H2.text: who invented the first computer game in 1962 and what was the name of the game. OXO

H3.text: who invented the first computer game in 1962 and what was the name of the game. Spacewar !

A4.text: Spacewar! was developed in 1962 by Steve Russell in collaboration with Martin Graetz, Wayne Wiitanen, Bob Saunders, Steve Piner, and others.

A5.text: It was written for the newly installed DEC PDP-1 minicomputer at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
